alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft; Western, Central Fremont County Below 8500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 23 at 8:33PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Light to Moderate Snow Tonight... Light, to occasionally moderate, snow is expected to persist across the southeast mountains tonight, and move into parts of the Highway 50 and southern I-25 corridors. While snow intensity and snowfall amounts should remain light, occasional visibility reductions to around one mile and lightly snow covered roads will be possible. Those traveling across the area tonight into early Friday morning, should be prepared for possible hazardous conditions.
